name: places/ChIJj7avB7RZwokRbqbPOdBhmGg
formattedAddress: 38A W 30th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 38A W 30th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
I was in desperate need for a fill on my nails, as well as a pedicure, and this was the closest nail salon near me with availability. It was small, but it was very clean, organized, and peaceful. The staff were all professional, helpful, and very accommodating. Iâ€™m big on smells right now, and this salon smelled so good and so cleanâ€”especially their towels!

The nail techs also did an outstanding job on my nails; as you can see from the picture, I didnâ€™t get something too simple, and they were able to do exactly what I wanted. I also had the best pedicure I think Iâ€™ve ever had. They were very thorough and really took their time. The 20-minute foot massage was actually 20 minutes. They set a timer and everything. They actually took time removing callouses (my feet look and feel brand new) and did everything in the pedicure description.

If I HAD to complain about anything, it was that it took a really long time. I was in there for 4 hours. However, I got the most extensive pedicure with gel polish and the 20-minute foot massage, and asked for different designs on every finger nail, so I expected it to take awhile.

Overall, I highly recommend this place! Iâ€™ll definitely be back next time I visit NY.

originalText.text: I am on a quick business trip in NYC and was desperate for a manicure. Walked in to this nail salon and couldnâ€™t be happier. As a typical Brazilian woman I like regular manicure with cuticles well trimmed. Diana did a wonderful job!!! I also did pedicure with her. I rarely use nail polish on my toe nails. This is the result!  Also amazing! Itâ€™s a clean and quiet place. Diana is the best!

originalText.text:
Itâ€™s a cool place. I would say verify the price before paying because some of the photos in other peopleâ€™s reviews have their old prices and have since been updated.

I went in to get a regular manicure but the nail polish they use chips away pretty fast. It is fast drying nail polish. I did the regular manicure and they alleged itâ€™s vegan nail polish/varnish.

I also got a gel pedicure, callous removal (but i do not recommend getting callous removal here since it is $15 extra and they use a cheese grader ðŸ¥´ðŸ¥´.. the $15 is for random liquid they put on my feet and wrap in plastic for like a few minutes.. see pictures for more information ). I also got the bottom half of my legs waxed.

Overall I am okay with the service I got, the person who assisted me was very sweet and worked quickly with my many service treatments. I just wish they would have given my feet a bit more attention. The nails are all different sizes and not shapes the same at all. The big toe nails are two different shapes and lengths now. I did ask did this to be corrected but it just got jacked up more in shape ðŸ™ƒðŸ˜­.

If I am being honest, I am not sure that I would return here.

originalText.text:
I loved it! I got a gel mani - and my nail tech (Diana) was so nice. She went above and beyond to make me feel comfy.
Her work was extremely clean, even before the nail paint, my nails looked so good!

Note: they donâ€™t have massage chairs etc, but the studio is airy and clean.

originalText.text: Got a gel manicure last week but the UV lamp was only working sporadically. I tried to tell the nail technician, but she just kept irritatedly turning it back on, even though it would only work for a few seconds at a time. The polish never fully hardened. One and half nails chipped badly and peeled within a day, and the whole manicure peeled off in less than a week. I do not recommend.

text.text: Got a gel manicure last week but the UV lamp was only working sporadically. I tried to tell the nail technician, but she just kept irritatedly turning it back on, even though it would only work for a few seconds at a time. The polish never fully hardened. One and half nails chipped badly and peeled within a day, and the whole manicure peeled off in less than a week. I do not recommend.
